name: Stick Stick
description:
Inspired by the Atari Frostbite game.

The character needs to cross the water to capture wood and put it in the truck.
The player who manages to collect 5 wooden loot first wins.

Made by

Allisson Angeli Donadia - Programmer
Carlos Rodrigues Junior - Programmer
Daniel Miranda - Art

Game controls

Player 1
A = Move left
D = Move to the right side
W = Move up
S = Move down
Spacebar = Grab trunk / Throw trunk / raise and lower arms
Left shift = By keeping it held it is possible to change the direction / aim of the character (Use directionals already mentioned)

Player 2
Left arrow = Move left
Right arrow = Move right
Up arrow = Move up
Down arrow = Move down
Enter = Grab trunk / Throw trunk / raise and lower arms
Right shift = By keeping it held it is possible to change the direction / aim of the character (Use directionals already mentioned)
